products.name: Backpack Brix
products.description: Classic backpack of the Brix collection. Laconic design, high-quality materials and practicality are its main advantages.

products.name: City Backpack Roll
products.description: The backpack of the Roll collection was created for the needs of the city: walking, work, study, gym, urban travel, spring and summer holidays. A roomy and functional assistant places all the necessary things for every day.

products.name: Backpack Rene
products.description: The backpack of the Rene collection is roomy, but not bulky, perfectly adapted to the modern rhythms of the city, created specifically to become your constant assistant.

products.name: Men's Backpack Zard
products.description: The backpack of the Zard collection is ideal for active people who are not used to wasting a second. They are useful both for traveling and for walks with friends, going to the gym, studying. They look neat on the back and at the same time mega-roomy: water, clothes, personal, any trinkets necessary for the conditions of the city.

products.name: BumBag City
products.description: The compact City BumBag in black gives a sense of originality and uniqueness in style. BumBag City will give you confidence, emphasize your image and individuality.

products.name: BumBag Dinamic
products.description: Fanny Pack BumBag Transformer Dynamic - Speed, Movement and Purpose. Bag for 9 compartments. It combines convenience, spaciousness and practicality.

products.name: BumBag Lili City
products.description: Stylish BumBag Lili City. An exquisite accessory that will not only complement your image, but thanks to its spaciousness, will allow you to have everything you need with you and in safety.

products.name: BumBag Lady City
products.description: A handbag made of genuine leather on the belt, the Sambag banana is a great option for people who follow fashion trends.

products.name: Bag Vogue red
products.description: The Vogue collection bag is a classic option for those who value convenience, comfort and minimalism in details.

products.name: Bag Cleo blue
products.description: A stylish women's bag that will complement your look, all the necessary trinkets will always be at hand.

products.name: Travel Bag Baron
products.description: The Travel Bag bag will become an indispensable accessory in your wardrobe. products.name: Bag Brad Pitt
products.description: Crossbody bag Brad Pitt sling is perfect for active people in whom comfort and practicality come first.
